title: Mayor Tubbs: The 26 Year-Old Trying to Steer Stockton
description: In November 2016, Mayor Michael Tubbs was elected to lead Stockton, Califronia by a 70% margin. The mayoral wunderkind joined Chuck Todd to talk about his ambitions for the city, and what he'd like to see from the state's governor.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
